definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
woven mat/seat/banquet/place in a democratic assembly/classifier for banquets, conversations etc
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)
Chairman Mao/Mao Zedong 毛澤東|毛泽东 (1893-1976), Chinese Communist leader
Quotations from Chairman Mao Tse-Tung, published from 1964 to about 1976

sentences.english: The hecklers were conducted away from the hall at the request of the Chairman.
sentences.chinese: 主席要求把捣蛋分子强行赶出大厅。

sentences.english: NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国奥委会主席是国家体育总局局长袁伟民。

sentences.english: This is a unique opportunity to get a progressive politician to be the president of the council.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个令进步政治家成为理事会主席得大好机会。

sentences.english: “So, did you bring the check?” Hu asks.
We teed off the meeting with the chairman's speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们以主席的讲话开始了此次会议。

sentences.english: All of these issues will be on the agenda tomorrow when I meet with President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 我明天与胡主席会晤时，会就上述所有问题交换看法。

sentences.english: Derek Fisher is the president of the NBA Players' Assn . and he will attend meetings in Phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 小鱼是NBA球员协会的主席，他也将出现在凤凰城。

sentences.english: Some bad-tempered members shouted at the chairman during the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 一些坏脾气的会员在会议期间向主席叫喊。

sentences.english: The chairman dispatched the meeting in half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 主席在半个钟头内就把会议迅速开完。

sentences.english: Deven Sharma is the president of Standard &Poor's.
As the chairman is ill, I am asking Mr Jones to act for him.
sentences.chinese: 现在主席病了，我打算请琼斯先生代理他。

sentences.english: Did you come early enough for the chairman's opening speech?
sentences.chinese: 你是早在主席致开幕词前就来了的吗？

sentences.english: The Chinese presidents have attended all the APEC informal leaders’ meetings.
sentences.chinese: 中国国家主席出席了历次APEC领导人非正式会议。

sentences.english: What will he discuss with President Jiang?
sentences.chinese: 他将与江主席讨论什么问题？

sentences.english: “Well, now I'm chairman emeritus,” Lauder says.
sentences.chinese: “哎，现在我是公司的名誉主席，”劳德说。

sentences.english: But Singh asserted that India backed both the panel and its chairman.
sentences.chinese: 辛格宣称，印度既支持该专门小组，也支持它的主席。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
